meanings.definition: Obtain or secure (something desired or beneficial)
meanings.sent1: She was gaining new friends at school.
meanings.sent2: The team is gaining momentum in the game.
meanings.sent3: He joked that he was gaining popularity faster than a rocket.
meanings.sent4: Her confidence was gaining strength like a growing tree.
meanings.sent5: The company was gaining profits steadily each month.

meanings.definition: Increase in amount, size, or number
meanings.sent1: The river was gaining speed as it flowed downhill.
meanings.sent2: The population of the city is gaining rapidly.
meanings.sent3: The snowball was gaining size as it rolled down the hill.
meanings.sent4: His laughter was gaining volume with each joke.
meanings.sent5: The storm was gaining intensity as it approached the coast.

meanings.definition: Acquire or develop (a skill, trait, or quality)
meanings.sent1: She was gaining knowledge through reading books.
meanings.sent2: He is gaining confidence in his public speaking abilities.
meanings.sent3: The puppy was gaining mischief as it grew older.
meanings.sent4: His determination was gaining strength like a warrior in battle.
meanings.sent5: The artist was gaining mastery over the brush with each stroke.
